price: Yet they rejected him and hamstrung her[6]. So their Lord destroyed them for their sin and leveled them to the ground.
arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمۡدَمَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمۡ فَسَوَّىٰهَا
